divs: sighting detailsdear sir's i was watching tv on saturday 2-26-11 and i saw a short part on the drone. i had two private i's and some guy from the uk here at my place over a year ago looking over the property showing me the photos that for sure where photos off my medi-vac pad i installed a few year's back due to the high amount of bad accident's we have here. i also was paid by them to take them around to all the neignbor's to see if they ever saw anything. some guy who i can't remember his name from the sacremento area also was here and sent me the photo's of this so called drone. i could never get a straight answer from them ever time i asked if it was a fake photoshop deal or what but was told they spent a lot of money proving the picture's are real but they need more info. i would have no problem taking with you about it or what i know since i have lived here for over 20 year's and the photos for sure have all my tree's est in it. i would like to know what you found out. thanks for your time !!! [witness name removed cms\dr]
